mapper.select: SELECT U_ID ,PHONE ,EMAIL ,USER_NAME ,USER_PW ,DATE_FORMAT(UPDATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS UPDATE_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATE_DATE ,DATE_FORMAT(LOGIN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LOGIN_DATE ,UPDATE_ID FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_TYPE = 'C010200' AND U_ID = #{userId}
